content.rendered:
We are MANAS

Your single source for cutting-edge IT & security technology solutions

More than just a
distributor, we are your tech ally

Manas IT has progressed from a traditional IT distributor into a comprehensive technology partner that evolves along with our clients’ ever-changing needs. Going beyond supplying products, we empower businesses with tailored solutions essential to flourishing in today’s dynamic digital landscape. For over a decade, companies have relied on our responsive team as a trusted one-stop shop for everything from consulting and IT infrastructure design to implementation and support. 

Our Vision

Our vision is to be the industry leader in providing value-driven IT infrastructure that powers resilient client growth.

Our Mission

We aim to build long-term partnerships with clients as they scale and evolve, tailoring state-of-the-art hardware, software and services to enhance their growth.

WHY CHOOSE US

Experience the
difference and unleash your potential with our commitment to
your growth

Quality Commitment

We provide top-tier products that meet standards of performance and reliability.

Fair Value

Our transparent, competitive pricing ensures cost-effective IT solutions.

End-to-End Solutions

We offer a comprehensive selection of cutting-edge products and services.

Seamless Support

Our experienced team support you throughout so you can focus on your business.

Meet Our Team

Our team combines deep industry knowledge, passion and cutting-edge expertise, backed by over 50 years of collective experience in technology solutions.

Akhil Sarawgi Director
Open Modal

Akhil Sarawgi

Director

A passionate entrepreneur at heart, Akhil brings dynamic leadership to our sales-driven organization. After earning his Electronics & Communications Engineering degree in 2008, he honed his expertise at Firepro Systems and Honeywell in infrastructure protection and safety. His eye for opportunity and commitment to excellence continues to drive our team’s success and growth.

Nikhil Sarawgi Director
Open Modal

Nikhil Sarawgi

Director

Nikhil brings his sharp business acumen to our leadership team, overseeing our valued relationships across SMB, enterprise, and education sectors. His journey includes pivotal roles in Investment Banking as Senior Analyst at Verity Knowledge Solutions (UBS Affiliate) and Associate Vice President at Amba Research. Armed with an MBA in Finance, he champions our mission of building meaningful, scalable customer connections.

Saurav Sarawgi Director
Open Modal

Saurav Sarawgi

Director

As co-founder of Manas, Saurav brings versatile leadership across Strategy, Sales, Marketing, Finance, and HR. His entrepreneurial journey, rooted in startup experience with Big City Promotions and Employee Perks, shapes our company’s direction. Having established our strong channel business, Saurav now spearheads our expansion into Bangalore’s dynamic startup and technology ecosystem, fostering meaningful strategic partnerships.

Join our team of Solution Architects

Drive innovation, embrace challenges, and build your career with a leader in technology solutions. We offer more than jobs – we create growth opportunities.

Join Now
It's been an incredible journey working at Manas IT. I've learned a lot from my colleagues. I'm motivated and engaged by the challenging projects. In addition, I like that the company is dedicated to finding a balance between work and family life, I'm grateful for all the opportunities and I'm looking forward to continuing my journey here. I'm confident that Manas IT will continue to be a leader in the IT industry. I'm proud to be part of this team.

Nivedha Kannan

Senior Sales Executive
